SqlList.OperationSql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LogID)as '序号',UserName as '操作人' ,CreateIP as'操作IP',CreateDate as '发生时间', (CASE Description WHEN 'ErrorBug' THEN '系统BUG' WHEN 'LogIn' THEN '用户登录' WHEN 'LogOut' THEN '用户登录' END)as '操作类型', ErrorMsg as '操作详情' FROM T_OperationLog where {0} order by LogID asc
SqlList.EfileConvertSql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY LogID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', f0.SingleProjectID as '工程KEY',f0.FileListID as '文件KEY',f0.EFileID as '电子文件KEY', f0.EFileStartPath as '文件存储位置',f0.FileName as '文件名称',f0.CreateDate as '发生时间',f0.Description as '转换错误日志' from T_EFile_ConvertLog f0 INNER JOIN T_SingleProject f1 ON f0.SingleProjectID=f1.SingleProjectID where {0} order by LogID asc
SqlList.ZrsCertificateSql_1: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f1.SingleProjectID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', f0.ReadyCheckBookCode as '证书编号', '责任书' as '证书类型', (case len(ISNULL(f0.ReadyCheckBookCode,'')) when 0 then '未发放' else '已发放' end)as '证书发放情况' , (SELECT ff.UserName FROM T_UsersInfo ff where ff.UserID=f0.CreateUserID)as '发放人', f0.CreateTime as '发放时间' from T_SingleProject f1 left JOIN T_ReadyCheckBook f0 ON f0.SingleProjectID=f1.SingleProjectID where 1=1 {0} order by f0.ReadyCheckBookCode,f0.ReadyCheckBookID desc
SqlList.ZrsCertificateSql_2: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f1.SingleProjectID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', '责任书' as '证书类型', '未发放'as '证书发放情况', ''as '证书编号', ''as '发放人', ''as '发放时间', '未发放'as '证书发放情况' from T_SingleProject f1 where 1=1 {0} order by f1.SingleProjectID asc
SqlList.RkzCertificateSql_1: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f1.SingleProjectID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', f0.ReadyCheckBookCode as '证书编号', '认可证' as '证书类型', (case len(ISNULL(f0.ReadyCheckBookCode,'')) when 0 then '未发放' else '已发放' end)as '证书发放情况' , (SELECT ff.UserName FROM T_UsersInfo ff where ff.UserID=f0.CreateUserID)as '发放人', f0.CreateTime as '发放时间' from T_SingleProject f1 left JOIN T_ReadyCheckBook f0 ON f0.SingleProjectID=f1.SingleProjectID where 1=1 {0} order by f0.ReadyCheckBookCode,f0.ReadyCheckBookID desc
SqlList.RkzCertificateSql_2: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f1.SingleProjectID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', '认可证' as '证书类型', '未发放'as '证书发放情况', ''as '证书编号', ''as '发放人', ''as '发放时间', '未发放'as '证书发放情况' from T_SingleProject f1 where 1=1 {0} order by f1.SingleProjectID asc
SqlList.ZmsCertificateSql_1: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f1.SingleProjectID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', f0.ReadyCheckBookCode as '证书编号', '证明书' as '证书类型', (case len(ISNULL(f0.ReadyCheckBookCode,'')) when 0 then '未发放' else '已发放' end)as '证书发放情况' , (SELECT ff.UserName FROM T_UsersInfo ff where ff.UserID=f0.CreateUserID)as '发放人', f0.CreateTime as '发放时间' from T_SingleProject f1 left JOIN T_ReadyCheckBook f0 ON f0.SingleProjectID=f1.SingleProjectID where 1=1 {0} order by f0.ReadyCheckBookCode,f0.ReadyCheckBookID desc
SqlList.ZmsCertificateSql_2: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY f1.SingleProjectID)as '序号', f1.gcbm as '工程编号',f1.gcmc as '工程名称',f1.gcdd as '工程地点', '证明书' as '证书类型', '未发放'as '证书发放情况', ''as '证书编号', ''as '发放人', ''as '发放时间', '未发放'as '证书发放情况' from T_SingleProject f1 where 1=1 {0} order by f1.SingleProjectID asc
